name: Words of Wizards
description:
Play as a Wizard through a mysterious Dungeon. Never enter the same room. Your goal is to get through as many levels as possible. But at the end of each level, you can pass down your Wizard's "wisdom" and pass on the spells obtained in your adventures allowing you to try different builds with different spells.

Controls:

RMB - Shoot

WASD - Movement

1-6 choose spell on Hotbar
